text: @WhiteHouse In actual numbers or per capita, your claim is inaccurate.  South Korea was producing 10000 test kits a day by the time America had its first reported death from Covid19.  By misleading by labeling this pandemic hoax... you allowed America to be the most harmed nation. Why?
